Portfolio

social gamers

Dream Walker helps users become lucid dreamers by allowing users to document their dreams and keep track of their sleeping patterns. With consistent documentation, a user is better able to recognize patterns while dreaming, and thus induce lucid dreaming.

Front End: HTML5 + CSS3 + JavaScript + jQuery
Back End: Node + Express + MongoDB + Passport

Dream Walker helps users become lucid dreamers by allowing users to document their dreams and keep track of their sleeping patterns. With consistent documentation, a user is better able to recognize patterns while dreaming, and thus induce lucid dreaming.

Front End: React + Redux + CSS3 + jQuery

Dream Walker helps users become lucid dreamers by allowing users to document their dreams and keep track of their sleeping patterns. With consistent documentation, a user is better able to recognize patterns while dreaming, and thus induce lucid dreaming.

About me

I'm an Atlanta-based full-stack developer that loves making awesome things, with awesome people, while eating awesome tacos.
I have a lot of fun turning complex problems into simple applications with user-centric designs. I like kale smoothies, discussing time travel, thinking about my 3 wishes for when I find a genie, doing dishes (boyfriend material right there), reading books about outer space, picking up semi-heavy things and putting them back down for 4 sets of 8-12 reps, foam rolling, and playing guitar.
